page.title: 04SUPERNATURAL SEVERN STOKE
page.content: On the site now occupied by the {Country Club}there was a farm where a young girl died under suspicious circumstances. Her ghost haunted the farm for many years until the farm was converted into a school. In the house now occupied by the Severn Stoke{Retirement Home}used to live the three Long sisters, one of whom was strangled by her boyfriend. Her ghost is said to haunt the home to this day! In 1983, a medium said there was a sword buried in the stonework of the bridge over{Knights Hill Pool.}The sword was subsequently discovered.
